trends: There have been no other sightings in Cardigan
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were in a static caravan we had just made love. Afterwards there was a lossof time for about three hours. When we awoke we both had a burn mark on ourbody. One of us on the back and one in the pubic area. We both have seen thismany times since the first night. It has affected our lives greatly.Ourpersonality has changed and we are telepathic with each other. We are ordinarypeople and do not know why this has happened to us. We continue to be watched bywhatever this entity is.We just want our own lives back.
